description: Our aim is to treat our guests with the utmost care to make sure that you benefit as much as possible from our expertise in a healing environment. Our Approach to Healthcare and Healing The therapists at Healflow are experts in their field, with advanced training in physical and holistic techniques that focus on repairing and balancing your body's health and well-being.

reviews.title: Best SPA
text: So glad that I discovered Healflow Wellness a few years ago. Best spa experience ever. The staff is so professional , pleasant and Knowledgable.

I absolutely love the massages that I get each month from  RT, Angel. In addition to my 90 minute massage, Angel also does cupping, which has really helped my lung and coughing problems.  Her massages are so relaxing and healing, especially with my 2 injuries. My husband is now going for massages and cupping.
Immense thanks to JC, Dario, Yessica, Angel and the entire Healflow Wellness team.
ðŸ¦‹Rosemarie and Stephen Taylor

reviews.title: Overall experience
text: Have been going to this spa on few occasions. From the greetings to the services, everything was cleaned, quiet and very professional.
Had a massage with Maria & Veronika. I strongly recommend either of them. EXCELLENT !!!

reviews.title: Great Couples Massage
text: Had a couples massage. Service was amazing! The therapists were so attentive and knowledgeable. Would definitely recommend. Space is clean, calming and relaxing.

reviews.title: Amazing place!!
text: I Highly recommend this place, I received 2 treatment and both were amazing, the first one was a swedish massage with susan and the other was a facial with Meagham, I just have to say that both were what I expected, the therapists so professional and intuitive.

reviews.title: Best massage of my life!
text: Tom is so intuitive, he was able to pin point all the areas of stress in my body with such ease and precision. I also felt an overall sense of calm and rejuvenation as though I had just spent hours with an energy healer. I highly recommend Tom, his work is pure magic!

reviews.title: Highly Recommended
text: One of my favourite places to go in the city to relax and be pampered. The staff are incredible and they put so much care into their clients.

reviews.title: Lovely relaxation massage!
text: I had an amazing experience at the HealFlow Wellness Centre! I received a Swedish massage from Cydney Smith and she was absolute magic! She's very warm and welcoming and had such attention to detail. She was able to completely transform my body into a total state of relaxation. I would definitely recommend her to anyone. 5 star experience hands down.

reviews.title: Go here for the best massage!
text: Last week, on a whim, I decided I really needed a massage so I looked around and saw great google reviews for this boutique spa near my old apartment. I gave them a call mid day and they were able to fit me in right away. When I arrived I was greeted warmly by the concierge and offered water before heading straight into the room (I didnâ€™t have much time before the appointment time otherwise I would have enjoyed the relaxation time in the waiting room). The waiting area offers infused water and snacks if you have time before and everyone wears some sandals around the old and well maintained Victorian house itâ€™s in.

I saw Carmen for a 45 neck and back massage but it was so much more than that - the title does it no justice except as a descriptor! Carmen gave me probably the BEST RMT massage Iâ€™ve ever had. I had a lot of tightness in my calves and neck and she really worked those areas. The normal sort of pain and sometimes even a light bruise I have received in other massages with good pressure to loosen things up was not there and yet I was relaxed, felt looser and re-energized when I finished. Carmen used some eucalyptus(I think) aroma therapy during various parts of the message. The bed was lined with a heated blanket that just added to the relaxation. She did an amazing scalp and neck massage (massaging the neck area often makes me a little nervous but it was nice). The room was nicely lit with blinds that blocked just enough light for a darkened room but letting some natural light in. A small thing for me was that she didnâ€™t try to talk the whole time, which was nice because the last RMTs Iâ€™ve had wanted to talk the whole time and it took away some of the relaxation. Carmen was amazing and used some different techniques that I hadnâ€™t experienced before and did it all with care, good pressure and softness. The warm towels to remove some of the massage oil used on my back was another nice touch.
I canâ€™t wait to go and book another massage here!

reviews.title: A Transformative treatment
text: I recieved a truely transformative treatment from Cydney Smith.  I felt really fortunate as she is new to the place.
First thing to notice is Healflow doesn't neglect any detail, from the warm towel treatment to quality tea options.  Before the treatment even begins you start will be feel at ease.
I am a larger guy with some tough issues in my shoulder and lower-back. Her ability to apply focused and adequate pressure where it was needed was truly impressive.

After an amazing massage the treatment continued with acupuncture needles and that is where my body really settled and relaxed.  While the massage felt good the combination of acupuncture and massage really had me feeling like a changed person afterwards.
My entire body felt so much more relaxed and at ease in a way that is hard to describe I continued to feel the effect over the rest of the day.  If you can try this place out.

reviews.title: Amazing therapy and beautiful space
text: I booked a massage for myself and a friend. I needed a sports massage, and the therapists were amazing. the treatments were soothing and also helped correct the issues I had, really a unique 5 star experience. It is worth the few extra dollars compared to a more in and out massage clinic or physio place.
Really lovely space and great customer service. My friend wanted a more relaxing treatment and she really loved it and said they used hot stones and essential oils.
Can't recommend more!

reviews.title: Amazing Massage
text: I had an amazing 90 minute deep tissue massage with Juan Carlos today to help clear away the post-Christmas toxins. I have had Juan Carlos massage me on several other occasions and itâ€™s always an amazing experience. He is the best therapist in the city as far as Iâ€™m concerned. I have been working out a lot lately and have had some shoulder and hip issues which he was able to help me with. Both feel much better after the session. I walked out feeling limber, rested and relaxed. Iâ€™ll be back again soon.

reviews.title: Amazing healing session
text: Just completed an amazing session Rupi which turned out to be an amazing healing session. She knew things about me and what I was going through with just the touch of her hands. Much more powerful than Reiki.  This is such an amazing little spa in the heart of Toronto. From what I understand this little place is where the influencers of Toronto all go for their treatments. The owner Juan Carlos is also the best massage therapist I have ever encountered and it seems that the elite of Toronto have discovered him as well. And the prices are extremely reasonable. Thanks HealFlow.

reviews.title: The best massage you will ever have!
text: I have now been to HealFlow several times for deep tissue massages, and once for a facial.  Every visit to this small spa has been exceptional.  The attention to detail is obvious: the place is spotlessly clean, the scents and sounds are soothing, the massage tables are heated, the linens are soft, and the massage itself is simply the best I have ever had!  Being a very active person, I have had many massages over the years.  Juan Carlos has the ability to hone in on all of my knots, even the ones I didn't know were there!
The facial was also excellent and incredibly relaxing.  My skin looked and felt great afterwards.
I have been a regular visitor of the high end hotel spas in Toronto, but no longer!
HealFlow is my new go-to favourite spa (and it's easier on the wallet).  I can't recommend Juan Carlos and HealFlow enough.

reviews.title: Incredible experience from this small boutique spa
text: From a friends recommendation, I visited this cute little three story spa in Toronto. From the minute I walked in, I knew it would be great. A beautiful lemongrass smell and soft music was everywhere. I was met by the owner Juan Carlos who has worked on celebs around the world in the best five star hotels before opening his own hotel lace. He has magic hands. The facilities are basic but extra clean and well maintained which is what I liked. I had a amazing relaxing massage followed by a facial peel my skin is glowing. He is not a RMT but he does have some working there for those who need insurance receipts. This place is going to be difficult to get into once everyone discovers it. Highly recommend to try it.
